name: Hatchback
description: A hatchback is a car body configuration with a rear door that swings upward to provide access to the main interior of the car as a cargo area rather than just to a separated trunk.

name: Sedan
description: A sedan is a typical example of a four-door passenger car.

name: SUV
description: SUVs are built with the combination of passenger cars with features of off-road vehicles.

name: Convertible
description: Convertible is popularly referred to as an 'Open-Top' car.

name: Coupe
description: A coupe is a two-door car with a sloping roofline, giving it a sporty stance.

name: Wagon
description: One of the most common types of cars in India is the Wagon. These cars are a good combination of a hatchback and a sedan.

name: Minivan
description: When designing minivans, the focus is usually on the size of the cabin space rather than the size of the storage space.

name: Crossover
description: Crossovers are cars with body types that are a mix of the above-mentioned vehicle types.

name: PICKUP TRUCK
description: A pickup is one of the most recognizable types of cars in the world.

name: 4x4
description: Pick-ups come in two or four-wheel drive. The 4x4. 4x4. This four-wheel drive vehicle can be either a pick-up truck or an SUV.

name: SPORTS CAR
description: A sports car is a car designed with an emphasis on dynamic performance, such as handling, acceleration, top speed, or the thrill of driving

name: Microcar
description: Microcar is a term often used for the smallest size of cars, with three or four wheels and often an engine smaller than 700 cc.

name: Limousine
description: A limousine, or limo for short, is a large, chauffeur-driven luxury vehicle with a partition between the driver compartment and the passenger compartment which can be operated mechanically by hand or by a button electronically.

name: Electric vehicle
description: An electric vehicle is a vehicle that uses one or more electric motors for propulsion.

name: MUV
description: MUV stands for multi-utility vehicle. As the name implies, these cars are intended for different usage.
